nodes.text: The Salenga were a sentient species which existed in the galaxy. They had pink skin, yellow eyes with vertical eyelids and triangular pupils, and hands with one thumb, one finger and a single wide appendage where humans and species with similar hand shapes had more fingers. Salenga also had a flap of skin hanging below the back of their head which resembled long hair. Ione Marcy, a female Salenga, was a thief on Coruscant during the Clone Wars.
